description: The AP_CLAIM_REVIEW table contains a row for each review on a claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AP_CLAIM_REVIEW_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The review type category ID for the review on the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


High Dollar


Medical Necessity


Random Audit


Pre-Pay Audit (External)


Pre-Pay Audit Update (External)

columns.name: ATTACH_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment associated with a review when it is attached to a claim.

columns.name: AP_CLAIM_REVIEW_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The review status category ID for the review on the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Under Review


Rejected


Not Applicable


Approved

columns.name: ATTACH_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the associated review was attached to the claim.

columns.name: COMPLETION_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment entered by the user who completed the associated review.

columns.name: COMPLETION_DTTM
columns.description: The completion date and time for the associated review.

columns.name: REJECTION_EOB_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the processing code (EOB code) attached when a review is rejected.

columns.name: ADDED_MANUALLY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this review was added manually by an end user. 'Y' indicates that the review was added manually. 'N' or NULL indicate that the review was added by the system.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: REVIEW_STATUS_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The review status reason category ID for the review on the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Claim Pending


Rules No Longer Match


Auto-Approve Rule Met
